content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Ms. Müller. I am open to discussing the rental price. How much were you considering?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the size of the apartment and its location. Since it's 25 square meters, I think a reasonable price would be around 650 Euro per month. What do you think?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 650 Euro per month is a very attractive offer, considering the size and location of the apartment. However, I am open to negotiations. Would you be willing to pay a little more to secure the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand that you might be willing to negotiate. How much more would you consider? I want to make sure I'm getting a good deal without overpaying.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: As a landlord, I am always looking to strike a balance between offering a competitive price and ensuring a fair return on my investment. Would you be willing to go up to 700 Euro per month? This would still be a great price for you, given the amenities and location of the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
